const ResultContent = (props) => { const tableContent = props.showContent const currentSaving = props.setSaving const isEmpty = props.setIsEmpty const formatCurrency = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits: 2, }); return (
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital {isEmpty && Year b a c } {!isEmpty && {tableContent.map((yearData) => ( {yearData.year} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear} {yearData.yearlyInterest} {yearData.savingsEndOfYear - currentSaving - (yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year)} {currentSaving + (yearData.yearlyContribution * yearData.year)} ))} }
) } export default ResultContent;
